Name: Glowing Ember
Description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Def.

Name: Bonfire
Description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Def.

Name: Ignis
Description: Boosts damage by 80% of unit's Def.

Name: Chilling Wind
Description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Res.

Name: Iceberg
Description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Res.

Name: Glacies
Description: Boosts damage by 80% of unit's Res.

Name: Flare
Description: If unit's HP ≥ 70% when Special triggers, boosts damage by 60% of foe's Res. If unit's HP < 70% when Special triggers, boosts damage by 40% of foe's Res and restores 30% of unit's maximum HP.

Name: Blue Flame
Description: Boosts damage by 10. If unit is adjacent to an ally, boosts damage by 25 instead.

Name: Dragon's Roar
Description: Boosts Special damage by 40% of unit's Res when Special triggers. If unit's or foe's Special is ready, or if unit's or foe's Special triggered before or during this combat, and also, if unit's Res ≥ foe's Res-4 during combat, reduces damage from foe's next attack by 40% (once per combat; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Armored Beacon
Description: Boosts Special damage by 40% of unit's Def. If foe's Range = 2 and unit or foe's Special is ready or triggered before or during this combat, reduces damage from foe's next attack by 40% (once per combat; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Armored Blaze
Description: Boosts Special damage by 40% of unit's Def when Special triggers. If foe's Range = 1 and unit or foe's Special is ready or triggered before or during this combat, reduces damage from foe's next attack by 40% (once per combat; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Armored Floe
Description: Boosts Special damage by 40% of unit's Res. If foe's Range = 2 and unit or foe's Special is ready or triggered before or during this combat, reduces damage from foe's next attack by 40% (once per combat; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: New Moon
Description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during combat.

Name: Moonbow
Description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 30% during combat.

Name: Luna
Description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat.

Name: Lethality
Description: When Special triggers, treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 75% during combat. Disables non-Special skills that "reduce damage by X%."

Name: Curved Shot
Description: Boosts Special damage by 30% of the greater of foe's Spd or Def. If unit's or foe's Special is ready or unit's or foe's Special triggered before or during this combat and if unit can attack during combat, reduces damage from foe's next attack by 40% (once per combat; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Dragon Gaze
Description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Atk.

Name: Draconic Aura
Description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Atk.

Name: Dragon Fang
Description: Boosts damage by 50% of unit's Atk.

Name: No Quarter
Description: Boosts damage by X% of unit's Atk when Special triggers (if foe is armored, X = 40; otherwise, X = 30). If Special triggers, neutralizes foe's "reduces damage by X%" effects from non-Special skills.

Name: Ruptured Sky
Description: Boosts damage by 20% of foe's Atk. If in combat against a dragon foe or beast foe, boosts damage by 40% instead of 20%.

Name: Fierce Beast
Description: Boosts Special damage by X% of unit's Atk when Special triggers (if transformed, X = 25; otherwise, X = 20). If Special triggers, neutralizes foe's "reduces damage by X%" effects from non-Special skills.

Name: Night Sky
Description: Boosts damage dealt by 50%.

Name: Glimmer
Description: Boosts damage dealt by 50%.

Name: Astra
Description: Boosts damage dealt by 150%.

Name: Deadeye
Description: Doubles damage dealt. Disables non-Special skills that "reduce damage by X%."

Name: Vital Astra
Description: Boosts damage by 30% of unit's Spd. If unit's Special is ready and unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from area-of-effect Specials (excluding Røkkr area-of-effect Specials) by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). At the start of combat, if unit's Special is ready and unit's Spd > foe's Spd, reduces damage from attacks during combat by percentage = difference between stats × 3 (max 30%). (Damage-reduction effects above are considered non-Special effects, so skills like Deadeye still apply.)

Name: Gust
Description: Boosts Special damage by 50% of unit's Spd when Special triggers. If unit's or foe's Special is ready or if unit's or foe's Special triggered before or during this combat, and if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-4, reduces damage from foe's next attack during combat by 40% (once per combat; excluding area-of-effect Specials).

Name: Retribution
Description: Boosts damage by 30% of damage dealt to unit.

Name: Reprisal
Description: Boosts damage by 30% of damage dealt to unit.

Name: Vengeance
Description: Boosts damage by 50% of damage dealt to unit.

Name: Daylight
Description: Restores HP = 30% of damage dealt.

Name: Noontime
Description: Restores HP = 30% of damage dealt.

Name: Sol
Description: Restores HP = 50% of damage dealt.

Name: Aether
Description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 50% during combat. Restores HP = half of damage dealt.

Name: Rising Flame
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Blazing Flame
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Growing Flame
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Rising Light
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Blazing Light
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Growing Light
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Rising Thunder
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Blazing Thunder
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to 1.5 x (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Growing Thunder
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Rising Wind
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Blazing Wind
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Growing Wind
Description: Before combat this unit initiates, foes in an area near target take damage equal to (unit's Atk minus foe's Def or Res).

Name: Buckler
Description: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 30%.

Name: Escutcheon
Description: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 30%.

Name: Pavise
Description: Reduces damage from an adjacent foe's attack by 50%.

Name: Holy Vestiments
Description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attack by 30%.

Name: Sacred Cowl
Description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attack by 30%.

Name: Aegis
Description: If foe is 2 spaces from unit, reduces damage from foe's attack by 50%.

Name: Godlike Reflexes
Description: If unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-4 and unit's Special is ready or unit's Special triggered during combat, deals damage = 15% of unit's Spd. When Special triggers, reduces damage from foe's attack by 40%. (Special triggers only if unit's Spd ≥ foe's Spd-4.)

Name: Galeforce
Description: If unit initiates combat, grants unit another action after combat. (Once per turn.)

Name: Miracle
Description: If unit's HP > 1 and foe would reduce unit's HP to 0, unit survives with 1 HP.

Name: Imbue
Description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores an additional 10 HP to target ally.

Name: Heavenly Light
Description: When healing an ally with a staff, restores 10 HP to all allies.

Name: Kindled-Fire Balm
Description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Atk+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Name: Swift-Winds Balm
Description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Spd+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Name: Solid-Earth Balm
Description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Def+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Name: Still-Water Balm
Description: When healing an ally with a staff, grants Res+4 to all allies for 1 turn.

Name: Black Luna
Description: Treats foe's Def/Res as if reduced by 80% during combat.

Name: Regnal Astra
Description: Boosts damage by 40% of unit's Spd.
